title: mri_cor2label
description: Converts values in a volume or surface overlay to a label. Designed to convert parcellation volumes stored in mri format.

input_file.title: Input File
input_file.description: Input volume or surface overlay file.

label_id.title: Label Identifier
label_id.description: Value to match in the input data.

label_file.title: Output Label File
label_file.description: Name of the output label file.

threshold.title: Threshold Value
threshold.description: Threshold the input to make label, e.g., input values must be greater than the threshold.

volume_file.title: Volume File
volume_file.description: Write the label volume to a file.

surface_overlay.title: Surface Overlay
surface_overlay.description: Interpret input as a surface overlay, specifying subject, hemisphere, and surface.

surface_path.title: Surface Path
surface_path.description: Specify surface path rather than subject/hemisphere.

optimize.title: Optimize
optimize.description: Treat input as a probability map and optimize thresholding.

remove_holes_islands.title: Remove Holes and Islands
remove_holes_islands.description: Remove holes in label and islands (only valid with --surf).

dilate.title: Dilate
dilate.description: Dilate label with specified number of dilations (only valid with --surf).

erode.title: Erode
erode.description: Erode label with specified number of erosions (only valid with --surf).
